title: Card1
description: In 2016, 44% of Downtown households spent more than 30% of their income on housing — only a slight improvement from 48% in 2006, showing that affordability challenges remain severe in the city’s core.

title: Card2
description: In 2016, 33% of Fairview households were cost-burdened, down from 34% in 2006, indicating modest progress in affordability over the decade.

title: Card3
description: In 2016, 37% of households citywide spent more than 30% on housing — showing little change from 38% in 2011.
